name: Mini-Game Madness
description:
I took part in the Game Parade 2020 game jam and created Mini-Game Madness. In this game you're tasked with completing a series of mini-games, but you're timed on each level so you've got to be quick.

I would've hoped to implement more levels and features, however I wasn't able to work on it for the full week. It was still a lot of fun though!

Download the game and let me know what you think!

Also check out my other games on my profile!
